Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig

Class WlsClusterConfig

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.operator.wlsconfig.WlsClusterConfig
public class WlsClusterConfig
extends java.lang.Object
Contains configuration of a WLS cluster.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    WlsClusterConfig()  
    WlsClusterConfig​(java.lang.String clusterName)
    Constructor for a static cluster when Json result is not available.
    WlsClusterConfig​(java.lang.String clusterName, WlsDynamicServersConfig dynamicServersConfig)
    Constructor that can also be used for a dynamic cluster.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    WlsClusterConfig addServerConfig​(WlsServerConfig wlsServerConfig)
    Add a statically configured WLS server to this cluster.
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object other)  
    java.lang.String getClusterName()
    Returns the name of the cluster that this WlsClusterConfig is created for.
    int getClusterSize()
    Returns the number of servers that are statically configured in this cluster.
    int getDynamicClusterSize()
    Returns the current size of the dynamic cluster (the number of dynamic server instances allowed to be created).
    WlsDynamicServersConfig getDynamicServersConfig()  
    int getMaxClusterSize()  
    int getMaxDynamicClusterSize()
    Returns the maximum size of the dynamic cluster.
    int getMinClusterSize()
    Returns the minimum size of the cluster.
    int getMinDynamicClusterSize()
    Returns the minimum size of the dynamic cluster.
    java.lang.String getName()
    Returns the name of the cluster that this WlsClusterConfig is created for.
    java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> getServerConfigs()
    Returns a sorted list of server configurations for servers that belong to this cluster, which includes both statically configured servers and dynamic servers.
    java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> getServers()  
    java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizePayload​(int clusterSize)
    Return the payload used in the REST request for updating the dynamic cluster size.
    java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizeUrl()
    Return the URL path of REST request for updating dynamic cluster size.
    WlsDomainConfig getWlsDomainConfig()
    Returns the WlsDomainConfig object for the WLS domain that this cluster belongs to.

    Whether the cluster contains any dynamic servers.

      public WlsClusterConfig()

    • WlsClusterConfig

      public WlsClusterConfig​(java.lang.String clusterName)
      Constructor for a static cluster when Json result is not available.
      Parameters:
      clusterName - Name of the WLS cluster

    • WlsClusterConfig

      public WlsClusterConfig​(java.lang.String clusterName, WlsDynamicServersConfig dynamicServersConfig)
      Constructor that can also be used for a dynamic cluster.
      Parameters:
      clusterName - Name of the WLS cluster
      dynamicServersConfig - A WlsDynamicServersConfig object containing the dynamic servers configuration for this cluster

  • Method Details

    • hasNamedServer

      public boolean hasNamedServer​(java.lang.String serverName)
      Returns true if one of the servers in the cluster has the specified name.
      Parameters:
      serverName - the name to look for
      Returns:
      true or false

    • addServerConfig

      public WlsClusterConfig addServerConfig​(WlsServerConfig wlsServerConfig)
      Add a statically configured WLS server to this cluster.
      Parameters:
      wlsServerConfig - A WlsServerConfig object containing the configuration of the statically configured WLS server that belongs to this cluster
      Returns:
      Cluster configuration

    • getClusterSize

    • getMaxClusterSize

      public int getMaxClusterSize()

    • getMinClusterSize

      public int getMinClusterSize()
      Returns the minimum size of the cluster.
      Returns:
      For static clusters, the minimum size can be 0. Dynamic servers will return the configured value.

    • getClusterName

      public java.lang.String getClusterName()
      Returns the name of the cluster that this WlsClusterConfig is created for.
      Returns:
      the name of the cluster that this WlsClusterConfig is created for

      public WlsDomainConfig getWlsDomainConfig()

      the WlsDomainConfig object for the WLS domain that this cluster belongs to

    • setWlsDomainConfig

      public void setWlsDomainConfig​(WlsDomainConfig wlsDomainConfig)
      Associate this cluster to the WlsDomainConfig object for the WLS domain that this cluster belongs to.
      Parameters:
      wlsDomainConfig - the WlsDomainConfig object for the WLS domain that this cluster belongs to

    • getServerConfigs

      public java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> getServerConfigs()
      Returns a sorted list of server configurations for servers that belong to this cluster, which includes both statically configured servers and dynamic servers.
      Returns:
      A sorted list of WlsServerConfig containing configurations of servers that belong to this cluster

    • getServers

      public java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> getServers()

    • setServers

      public void setServers​(java.util.List<WlsServerConfig> servers)

    • hasStaticServers

      public boolean hasStaticServers()
      Whether the cluster contains any statically configured servers.
      Returns:
      True if the cluster contains any statically configured servers

    • hasDynamicServers

      public boolean hasDynamicServers()
      Whether the cluster contains any dynamic servers.
      Returns:
      True if the cluster contains any dynamic servers

    • getDynamicClusterSize

      public int getDynamicClusterSize()
      Returns the current size of the dynamic cluster (the number of dynamic server instances allowed to be created).
      Returns:
      the current size of the dynamic cluster, or -1 if there is no dynamic servers in this cluster

    • getMaxDynamicClusterSize

      public int getMaxDynamicClusterSize()
      Returns the maximum size of the dynamic cluster.
      Returns:
      the maximum size of the dynamic cluster, or -1 if there is no dynamic servers in this cluster

    • getMinDynamicClusterSize

      public int getMinDynamicClusterSize()
      Returns the minimum size of the dynamic cluster.
      Returns:
      the minimum size of the dynamic cluster, or -1 if there is no dynamic servers in this cluster

    • getUpdateDynamicClusterSizeUrl

      public java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizeUrl()
      Return the URL path of REST request for updating dynamic cluster size.
      Returns:
      The REST URL path for updating cluster size of dynamic servers for this cluster

    • getUpdateDynamicClusterSizePayload

      public java.lang.String getUpdateDynamicClusterSizePayload​(int clusterSize)
      Return the payload used in the REST request for updating the dynamic cluster size. It will be used to update the cluster size of the dynamic servers of this cluster.
      Parameters:
      clusterSize - Desired dynamic cluster size
      Returns:
      A string containing the payload to be used in the REST request for updating the dynamic cluster size to the specified value.
